title: This AI image generator is as nice or naughty as you need
content:
Macworld

Why pay monthly for a watered-down AI image tool that restricts your creativity when you can have one that does everything, even the stuff most apps won’t touch? Imagiyo is an AI image generator that lets you bring your weirdest, wildest, or most polished ideas — and it’s only $30 for life.

You want pixel art? Sure. Photorealistic blog images? Go for it. Need something that toes the NSFW line? Imagiyo doesn’t judge, it just delivers.

With support for FLUX AI and Stable Diffusion models, Imagiyo gives you control over the style, lighting, emotion, and resolution of every image. It works on mobile and desktop, supports commercial use, and doesn’t watermark or limit your downloads. You get 250 images per month and up to two images per request. That’s more than enough to crank out a design portfolio, a fantasy pin-up collection, or whatever else your imagination cooks up.

Imagine with Imagiyo, the NSFW AI Image Generator, for $29 (reg. $345) while this deal lasts.
